fields.1-name.placeholder.description: An example to guide the user for field '1-name'

fields.10-icca-legal.label.message: 10. Who legally (according to state law) owns the land/sea on which the ICCA is situated?

fields.10-icca-legal.options.communal.message: Communal: owned by one or more communities/indigenous peoples

fields.10-icca-legal.options.contested.message: Contested: more than one entity claims ownership of the ICCA

fields.10-icca-legal.options.for_profit.message: For-profit organisation(s): owned by for-profit organisations

fields.10-icca-legal.options.joint_owner.message: Joint ownership: owned collectively by two or more of the above entities

fields.10-icca-legal.options.landowners.message: Individual landowners: owned by individual landowners

fields.10-icca-legal.options.multiple_ow.message: Multiple ownership: different parts of the land/sea are owned by different entities

fields.10-icca-legal.options.none_profit.message: Non-profit organisation(s): owned by non-profit organisations

fields.10-icca-legal.options.not_reporte.message: Not Reported: ownership type is not known

fields.10-icca-legal.placeholder.description: An example to guide the user for field '10-icca-legal'

fields.11-icca-legal-rights.label.message: 11. What are the legal rights (under the state legal system) of the community to use the resources within the ICCA, excluding subsurface resources?

fields.11-icca-legal-rights.options.de f.description: Label for option 'de facto' for field '11-icca-legal-rights'
fields.11-icca-legal-rights.options.de f.message: De facto rights to all resources (full control of resources, although not in law)

fields.11-icca-legal-rights.options.full.message: Full legal rights to all resources

fields.11-icca-legal-rights.options.only.description: Label for option 'only certain' for field '11-icca-legal-rights'
fields.11-icca-legal-rights.options.only.message: Rights to only certain resources/ a set amount

fields.11-icca-legal-rights.options.only.description: Label for option 'only commercial' for field '11-icca-legal-rights'
fields.11-icca-legal-rights.options.only.message: Rights to commercial use of the resources

fields.11-icca-legal-rights.options.othe.message: Other (please describe under the final question)

fields.11-icca-legal-rights.options.prot.description: Label for option 'protection only' for field '11-icca-legal-rights'
fields.11-icca-legal-rights.options.prot.message: Protection of resources only: no use allowed

fields.11-icca-legal-rights.options.with.description: Label for option 'with limitations' for field '11-icca-legal-rights'
fields.11-icca-legal-rights.options.with.message: Legal rights to all resources, within certain constraints (e.g. legal regulations/limitations)

fields.11-icca-legal-rights.placeholder.description: An example to guide the user for field '11-icca-legal-rights'

fields.12-icca-threats.helperText.message: For example, threats to the ICCA’s continued existence, or to its biodiversity.

fields.12-icca-threats.label.message: 12. What are the major threats and challenges for the ICCA if any? (Please only select up to three)

fields.12-icca-threats.options.bad_manag.message: Inappropriate management (e.g., management approaches or practices that are detrimental to the ICCA’s biodiversity or other values)

fields.12-icca-threats.options.biodivers.message: Decline in quality or quantity of biodiversity or nature (e.g., clean water and air, healthy soil)

fields.12-icca-threats.options.climate_c.message: Climate change (e.g., rapidly changing temperature and precipitation patterns, sea level rise, extreme weather events)

fields.12-icca-threats.options.extractio.message: Extraction (e.g., hunting, mining, logging or fishing)

fields.12-icca-threats.options.other.message: Other (please describe under the final question)

fields.12-icca-threats.options.overharve.message: Over-harvesting (specify if from within or outside the community)

fields.12-icca-threats.placeholder.description: An example to guide the user for field '12-icca-threats'

fields.13-icca-support.label.message: 13. What forms of support has the community self-identified as most needed for the ICCA? (Please only select up to three)

fields.13-icca-support.options.collabora.message: Collaboration or communication with other ICCAs

fields.13-icca-support.options.developme.message: Partnerships for self-determined development initiatives and sustainable livelihoods

fields.13-icca-support.options.equipment.message: Equipment, e.g. GIS software, cameras, video recorders, computers

fields.13-icca-support.options.legal.message: Legal support (e.g., to file claims or resist external projects through litigation)

fields.13-icca-support.options.other.message: Other (please describe under the final question)

fields.13-icca-support.options.recogniti.message: Appropriate recognition (legal or otherwise) from state authorities and/or other organisations

fields.13-icca-support.options.technical.message: Technical capacity-building: IT, analytical or problem-solving skills, management plan guidance

fields.13-icca-support.placeholder.description: An example to guide the user for field '13-icca-support'

fields.14-icca-other.placeholder.description: An example to guide the user for field '14-icca-other'
fields.14-icca-other.placeholder.message: Any other important information you would like to share

fields.2-icca-country.helperText.message: What country is this ICCA located in?

fields.2-icca-country.placeholder.description: An example to guide the user for field '2-icca-country'

fields.3-icca-area.helperText.message: Select the ICCA shape and press Ctrl-i to get statistics of the area.

fields.3-icca-area.placeholder.description: An example to guide the user for field '3-icca-area'

fields.4-icca-land-sea.label.message: 4. Is the ICCA on land, in the sea, or both?

fields.4-icca-land-sea.options.land and.description: Label for option 'land and sea' for field '4-icca-land-sea'

fields.4-icca-land-sea.placeholder.description: An example to guide the user for field '4-icca-land-sea'

fields.4a-icca-sea-area.helperText.message: If the ICCA includes any area in the sea, what is the size, in kilometres-squared, of this part?

fields.4a-icca-sea-area.label.message: 4a. Area of ICCA in the sea (km²)

fields.4a-icca-sea-area.placeholder.description: An example to guide the user for field '4a-icca-sea-area'

fields.5-icca-decision-maker.label.message: 5. Who is accountable for the decision-making and rules of the ICCA?

fields.5-icca-decision-maker.options.col.message: Collaborative governance (one entity is responsible, but is required to consult with others)

fields.5-icca-decision-maker.options.joi.message: Joint governance (two or more entities are jointly responsible)

fields.5-icca-decision-maker.placeholder.description: An example to guide the user for field '5-icca-decision-maker'

fields.5a-icca-no-take-area.helperText.message: What is the size, in kilometres-squared, of the no-take area?

fields.5a-icca-no-take-area.placeholder.description: An example to guide the user for field '5a-icca-no-take-area'

fields.6-icca-status.label.message: 6. Status: is the ICCA recognised by the national government for its role in conservation?

fields.6-icca-status.options.designated.message: Designated: legally-designated as a protected area or other type of conservation area

fields.6-icca-status.options.established.message: Established: established by the indigenous people or local community, but not legally-designated as a protected area or other type of conservation area

fields.6-icca-status.options.proposed.message: Proposed: approved for future legal-designation as a protected area or other type of conservation area

fields.6-icca-status.placeholder.description: An example to guide the user for field '6-icca-status'

fields.7-icca-year.helperText.message: You can also answer "Unknown" or "Time immemorial"

fields.7-icca-year.label.message: 7. In which year did this status come into effect? If the status is established, this is the year in which the ICCA first came into being

fields.7-icca-year.placeholder.description: An example to guide the user for field '7-icca-year'

fields.8-icca-type.helperText.message: (this can be the legal designation of the ICCA, e.g. Indigenous Reserve, or the type of ICCA as defined by the indigenous people or community, e.g. sacred site).

fields.8-icca-type.placeholder.description: An example to guide the user for field '8-icca-type'

fields.9-icca-objectives.label.message: 9. Objectives: what are the main objectives of managing the ICCA? (Please only select up to three)

fields.9-icca-objectives.options.other.message: Other (please describe under the final question 14)

fields.9-icca-objectives.options.self_de.message: Increasing rights for self determination and empowerment

fields.9-icca-objectives.options.territo.message: Territorial security (control of access to land and resources)

fields.9-icca-objectives.placeholder.description: An example to guide the user for field '9-icca-objectives'

fields.culture.placeholder.description: An example to guide the user for field 'culture'
fields.culture.placeholder.message: What happened here, or why is this place important to the community?

fields.icca-legal-recognition.helperText.message: Is the area delimited by the boundary legally recognised by your national governments? (Question 10, above, refers to conservation status. This question refers to recognition of land rights within the area)

fields.icca-legal-recognition.placeholde.description: An example to guide the user for field 'icca-legal-recognition'

fields.name.placeholder.description: An example to guide the user for field 'name'

fields.resource.placeholder.description: An example to guide the user for field 'resource'

fields.threat.placeholder.description: An example to guide the user for field 'threat'
